item.title: @bsky.app CEO @jay.bsky.team details how the platform utilizes open networks to allow users to craft their own social media experience while maintaini...
item.description: @bsky.app CEO @jay.bsky.team details how the platform utilizes open networks to allow users to craft their own social media experience while maintaining their personal privacy.
item.author: SXSW

item.title: üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (5/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (5/5)

We‚Äôre also pleased to include 3 new community translations: Welsh, Scottish Gaelic, and Esperanto.

As always, we‚Äôd like to thank our contributors and translators, including new contributors NicolasBorlet and seth-wood!
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (4/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (4/5)

Mute accounts more quickly!

Tap the ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù three-dot menu and select "Mute account" to mute directly from a post.
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (3/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (3/5)

In addition to tooling to reduce DM spam, we‚Äôve also added a new Chat Requests screen for messages from unknown users. You can accept or reject new conversations here.
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (2/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.99 is rolling out now (2/5)

People said it couldn‚Äôt be done, but we cracked the technology:

Videos can now be up to 3 minutes long!

Put another way, the Bee Movie now only takes 30 posts. (Please don‚Äôt test that.)
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ App Version 1.99 is rolling out now (1/5)
item.description:
üì¢ App Version 1.99 is rolling out now (1/5)

With every update, we‚Äôre aiming to make the Internet less toxic, more fun, and more in your control.

‚Ä¢ 3 minute videos!
‚Ä¢ A separate request inbox for DMs from unknown users
‚Ä¢ Mute accounts more quickly
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: Every few years, we sign up for yet another platform just to keep in touch with our friends. Private platforms have locked users in for too long, caus...
item.description:
Every few years, we sign up for yet another platform just to keep in touch with our friends. Private platforms have locked users in for too long, causing a lack of innovation & competition in social media.

Bluesky aims to fundamentally change this.

Live in 20 min with @jay.bsky.team:
Bluesky's CEO on the Future of Social Media | SXSW LIVE
YouTube video by SXSW
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: Catch us in Austin, TX for @sxsw.com!
item.description:
Catch us in Austin, TX for @sxsw.com!

On Monday, March 10, tune in for @jay.bsky.team's keynote with @mmasnick.bsky.social on the future of social and how we can take back control of our experience online.
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: Jay Graber, @jay.bsky.team, CEO of @bsky.app joined @maribel-wadsworth.bsky.social on the #KMF25 stage for a timely conversation on the social network...
item.description:
Jay Graber, @jay.bsky.team, CEO of @bsky.app joined @maribel-wadsworth.bsky.social on the #KMF25 stage for a timely conversation on the social network‚Äôs rapid growth, unique algorithm and how journalists can leverage it effectively.

Watch the full conversation here: kf.org/419MKgK
item.author: Knight Foundation

item.title: üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (5/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (5/5)

As always, we‚Äôd like to thank our contributors and translators. There are so many that we‚Äôre going to switch to just shouting out our first-time contributors. This release, that‚Äôs andrefernandes-95 and Armster15!
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (4/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (4/5)

Find posts by specific users more easily!

You can now go to their profile, tap the ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù three-dot menu, and select ‚ÄúSearch posts.‚Äù
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (3/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (3/5)

To set the default reply settings for all future posts, head to Settings > Moderation > Interaction Settings.

You can also always change reply settings per post.
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (2/5)
item.description:
üì¢ 1.98 is rolling out now (2/5)

Choose who can reply to your posts by clicking into ‚ÄúAnybody can interact.‚Äù

Now you can choose ‚Äúyour followers‚Äù as an option ‚Äî aka only people who follow you can reply to the post!
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: üì¢ App Version 1.98 is rolling out now, including: (1/5)
item.description:
üì¢ App Version 1.98 is rolling out now, including: (1/5)

‚Ä¢ a new option for who can reply to your posts
‚Ä¢ search posts by a user
‚Ä¢ lots of little improvements to make the app feel better!
item.author: Bluesky

item.title: happy first birthday to Bluesky, and what a year it's been!
item.description:
happy first birthday to Bluesky, and what a year it's been!

with every day, the need for an open network that puts people first becomes increasingly clear. we're glad to be building this with you. after all, the heart of a social network is the people.
item.author: Bluesky
